sub_title: Digital Procurement Transformation Lead at Unilever
summary:
I have over 12 years of global experience in the Plan, Source and Deliver elements of the supply chain.  I have had exposure to roles and projects across FMCG, Banking and the Automotive industry with my most recent roles being in South East Asia across FMCG Procurement.  I hold an APICS Certified Supply Chain Professional (CSCP) accreditation and I am currently completing a Masters focussed on Innovation and Entrepreneurship in Singapore.

I most enjoy taking on new and unchartered projects and love working with great teams to deliver value.
